column5: Large floor plan with 2 master bedrooms - one up and one down, 2 baths, loft, study, one-car garage PLUS one assigned parking space. 2 story ceilings in the living room with fireplace, and lots of windows. Laminate Wood floors in the living room & dining room, C-tile in the kitchen and baths. Close to shopping, restaurants, Dallas North Tollway and George Bush! A great property with 2 swimming pools and a hot tub! Don't wait....these rent quickly!
